| icon           = poe2 grog_icon.png
| description    = A simple blend of liquor and water. As barrels of water quickly stagnate over weeks at sea, this beverage offers a safe alternative for sailors, and is much more prized. Any sufficiently potent spirit will do when mixing grog, and no two casks ever taste alike.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Quick item

| item_category  = Consumable

| range          =

| effects        = +15% Damage with Melee attacks;-1 [Dexterity](/dexterity/)
| item_bonuses   = 
| enchantments   =

| rel_items      = 
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = Food_grog
| location       =
* Purchased in most ports from the Ship Supply merchant
* [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/): Sold by [Gyntel](/gyntel/) in [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/).
* [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): Sold by [Emaita](/emaita/).
* [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [The Hole](/theHole/): Sold by [Fyrna](/fyrna/).
* [The Brass Citadel](/theBrassCitadel/): Sold by the [Lounge server](/loungeServer/) in the [Officer's Lounge](/officersLounge/).
* [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/): Sold by [Jacob Harker](/jacobHarker/).
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/): Sold by [Kipeha](/kipeha/).
* 20 Grog can be gained from the [Scavenger Hunt](/scavengerHunt/);
| guid           =2536658d-34db-4eee-842d-5ae4a9fed342
}}
